item.title: Automating Grocery Lists with AI and LilArmy Scripts
item.description: My Friend Deepesh Mehta asked me to build a feature in lilarmy that he could use to manage his pantry inventory. My first reaction was “Oh let’s do some agent for that!” I guess I am AI bias like everybody else… but after a little bit of reflection, and some conversation with Claudio and Blue, yeah I named my agents, Claudio is actually Claude Code and Blue a OpenClaw that I talk using Telegram… But after the conversation I realized that what my friend needs is a deterministic behaviour: Define the expected state of the inventory, gather information of the current state and list what is missing, a.
